dc.title: The Executive Secretary
dc.description: On behalf of the American Warfighter and Taxpayer, support Secretary and Deputy Secretary of Defense decision making, selected DoD resource allocation, and immediate office management by ensuring accurate, concise, coordinated and timely tasking and processing of executive correspondence as the primary Department of Defense administrative liaison to the White House, National Security Council, and Interagency.
dc.subject: executive secretary
dod
department of defense
administrative support
